2.comment: pixels (px) font-specific offset adjustment to align heights between the root font face

condensed.comment: has units b/c letter spacing has values with and without units

extended.comment: has units b/c letter spacing has values with and without units

baseSize.comment: TODO-AH: adjust font calculations to use this value. pixels (px) used as the reset value in the html reset
